
```{r}
string_vec = c("my","name","is","Veronica")

str_detect(string_vec, "s")
str_detect(string_vec, "veronica")
```


```{r}
string_vec = c(
  "i think we all rule for participating",
  "i think i have been caught",
  "i think this will be quite fun actually",
  "it will be fun, i think"
  )

str_detect(string_vec, "i think")
str_detect(string_vec, "^i think") #looking for the beginning of the line
str_detect(string_vec, "i think$") #looking for the end of the line
```


```{r}
string_vec = c(
  "Time for a Pumpkin Spice Latte!",
  "went to the #pumpkinpatch last weekend",
  "Pumpkin Pie is obviously the best pie",
  "SMASHING PUMPKINS -- LIVE IN CONCERT!!"

str_detect(string_vec,"[Pp]umpkin") #found the string with regardless to uppercase / lowercase
```

```{r}
string_vec = c(
  '7th inning stretch',
  '1st half soon to begin. Texas won the toss.',
  'she is 5 feet 4 inches tall',
  '3AM - cant sleep :('
  )

str_detect(string_vec, "^[0-9][a-zA-Z]") #detect number+aplahbetic combination with no space in between
```

```{r}
string_vec = c(
  'The CI is [2, 5]',
  ':-]',
  ':-[',
  'I found the answer on pages [6-7]'
  )

str_detect(string_vec, "\\[") #detect the special character put \\ before, put \\\\ to detect \\ itself
```

```{r}
nsduh_url = "http://samhda.s3-us-gov-west-1.amazonaws.com/s3fs-public/field-uploads/2k15StateFiles/NSDUHsaeShortTermCHG2015.htm"

data_marj = 
  read_html(nsduh_url) |> 
  html_table() |> 
  first() |>
  slice(-1) |>
  select(-contains("P Value")) |>
  pivot_longer(
    -State,
    names_to = "age_year", 
    values_to = "percent") |>
  separate(age_year, into = c("age", "year"), sep = "\\(") |>
  mutate(
    year = str_replace(year, "\\)", ""),
    percent = str_replace(percent, "[a-c]$", ""),
    percent = as.numeric(percent))
```


```{r}
data_marj |>
  filter(
    age == "12-17",
    !(State %in% c("Total U.S.","South"))) |> 
  mutate(
    State = fct_reorder(State, percent)
    ) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = State, y = percent, color = year)) + 
    geom_point() + 
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))
```



```{r}
data("rest_inspec")

rest_inspec |> 
  group_by(boro, grade) |> 
  summarize(n = n()) |> 
  pivot_wider(names_from = grade, values_from = n)

rest_inspec =
  rest_inspec |>
  filter(grade %in% c("A", "B", "C"), boro != "Missing") |> 
  mutate(boro = str_to_title(boro))


rest_inspec |> 
  filter(str_detect(dba, "Pizza")) |> 
  group_by(boro, grade) |> 
  summarize(n = n()) |> 
  pivot_wider(names_from = grade, values_from = n)
```
